frontPage1.title: Meet the new Studio Pro, DUDE
frontPage1.subtitle: Version 2.0 of the Studio Pro theme for the Genesis Framework

frontPage2.leftContent: Easy to personalize with plenty of color and layout settings in the Customizer
frontPage2.centerContent: Lightweight and minimal code for the fastest possible page load time performance
frontPage2.rightContent: Looks great on devices of all shapes and sizes with mobile first CSS and design

customers.name: David Shea
customers.testimonial: If you aren't sure, always go for Studio Pro. Not able to tell you how happy I am with Studio Pro. Studio Pro saved my business. I would be lost without Studio Pro. DUDE

customers.name: Jess Humphries DUDE
customers.testimonial: Studio Pro should be nominated for service of the year. Keep up the excellent work. We were treated like royalty.

customers.name: Todd Smith
customers.testimonial: I can't say enough about Studio Pro. Thanks to Studio Pro, we've just launched our 5th website! Studio Pro is worth much more than I paid.

customers.name: Emma Jones
customers.testimonial: Needless to say we are extremely satisfied with the results. I like Studio Pro more and more each day because it makes my life a lot easier. After using Studio Pro my business skyrocketed!

frontPage5.text: Studio Pro is an elegant Genesis child theme designed for creative businesses of any kind. It features a stunning background video section with colorful gradient overlays sure to grab the visitors' attention DUDE
